snippet: A Roman Catholic nun testified that she was fired from her job at a Pennsylvania parish after reporting her suspicions about a priest who had been convicted of receiving child pornography.
abstract: Sister Joan Scary, a Roman Catholic nun, testifies at the landmark clergy sexual abuse trial involving the Archdiocese of Philadelphia that she was fired from her job at a Pennsylvania parish after reporting her suspicions about a priest who had been convicted of receiving child pornography.
lead_paragraph: A Roman Catholic nun testified that she was fired from her job at a Pennsylvania parish after reporting her suspicions about a priest who had been convicted of receiving child pornography.
